post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Database Developer



  POSITION DESCRIPTION

D3 Management Inc. a subsidiary of Playcentric is an interactive Marketing Agency supporting a consumer based transactional site on behalf of our clients. We are currently searching for individuals to expand our team in the role of:

Title: DATABASE DEVELOPER (Intermediate/Senior)

Department: Information Technology Group

Reports To: Director, Technology

Position Mandate:
A database specialist that can apply extensive experience in data modeling,
database administration and application development to design, implement,
deploy and support the enterprise뭩 database resources.

Primary Responsibilities:

Identifying and correcting database application performance problems both prior
deployment and in production.

Planning database backup, replication and distribution in a highly distributed,
high availability environment

Development of data migration and data integration, strategies and services

Comprehensive database disaster recovery planning

Developing database standards and reviewing adherence to standards by the
development team

Working with clients to develop collaborative data exchange and data sharing solutions

Skills:

Data Modeling/Reverse Engineering, logical and physical database design using a CASE tool, Visio, ERWin

Microsoft SQL Server 2000, MCDBA Certification an asset

Familiarity with inbound and outbound data exchange practices using various
formats, XML, CSV, EDI

Exposure to Data exchange servers, preferably Microsoft Biztalk Server, development and utilization of XML schemas, Web Services, SOAP, WDSL and UDDI

Experience:

5+ years of SQL programming/DBA full life뻙ycle database administrator and architect.

Last position should be related to 'database developer' or 'DBA'

Experience with designing database gateways would be an asset


If you would like to be considered for this position, please email your resume
with the position you are applying for in the subject line of the email to:
careers@playcentric.com

Interviews are targeted to start immediately.

While we thank everyone who submits a resume, due to time constraints, we will
only be able to contact those chosen for an interview.


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent  

Contact Information
careers@playcentric.com
PlayCentric Corp.
post.title: Database Developer
